Projects

These are some of the projects developed by me.

SPARK - An AI based smart personal assistant capable of talking and chatting with it's master, controlling home aplliances, recognise people, entertain it's master and much more.
SUDO - A machine learning based sudoku solver robot capable of solving sudoku by just seeing it within few seconds.
SPYDRO - A GPS enabled surveillance drone which can be controlled over the Internet and can stream live video over the Internet.
